text: Jerry Adler (born February 4, 1929) is an American actor, director and producer. He is probably best known for his roles as Herman "Hesh" Rabkin in The Sopranos (1999–2007) and as Howard Lyman in The Good Wife (2011–2016). He has also directed a number of plays. Adler was born in Brooklyn, New York City.
